It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 45 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 47 class point_iterator_ 48 { 49 public: 51 typedef trivial_iterator_tag iterator_category; 52 54 typedef trivial_iterator_difference_type difference_type; 55 57 typedef value_type_ value_type; 58 60 typedef pointer_ pointer; 61 63 typedef const_pointer_ const_pointer; 64 66 typedef reference_ reference; 67 69 typedef const_reference_ const_reference; 70 72 inline 73 point_iterator_() 74 : m_p_value(0) 75 { } 76 78 inline 79 point_iterator_(const point_iterator_& other) 80 : m_p_value(other.m_p_value) 81 { } 82 84 pointer 85 operator->() const 86 { 87 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(m_p_value != 0); 88 return (m_p_value); 89 } 90 92 reference 93 operator*() const 94 { 95 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(m_p_value != 0); 96 return (*m_p_value); 97 } 98 100 bool 101 operator==(const point_iterator_& other) const 102 { return m_p_value == other.m_p_value; } 103 105 bool 106 operator==(const point_const_iterator_& other) const 107 { return m_p_value == other.m_p_value; } 108 110 bool 111 operator!=(const point_iterator_& other) const 112 { return m_p_value != other.m_p_value; } 113 115 bool 116 operator!=(const point_const_iterator_& other) const 117 { return m_p_value != other.m_p_value; } 118 119 inline 120 point_iterator_(pointer p_value) : m_p_value(p_value) 121 { } 122 123 protected: 124 friend class point_const_iterator_; 125 126 friend class PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC; 127 128 protected: 129 pointer m_p_value; 130 }; 131 #endif
